example.ex: Manufacturers are looking into building cars out of plastic to avoid the problem of rust.
example.tran: 制造商们正研究如何用塑料制造车辆，以避免生锈。

value.def: Rust is a brown substance that forms on iron or steel, for example when it comes into contact with water.

example.ex: Copper nails are better than iron nails because the iron rusts...
example.tran: 铜钉比铁钉好，因为铁会生锈。

example.ex: There was an old rusting bolt on the door.
example.tran: 门上有一个生锈的旧门闩。

value.def: When a metal object rusts, it becomes covered in rust and often loses its strength.

example.ex: ...turquoise woodwork with accent colours of rust and ochre.
example.tran: 主色调为深褐色和赭色的青绿色木制品

value.def: Rust is sometimes used to describe things that are reddish-brown in colour.
Rust is a disease which affects plants. It is caused by a fungus.
